thread.title: Mrs Jacqueline Mitchell
thread.title_full: Glasses Direct reviewed by Mrs Jacqueline Mitchell

author: Mrs Jacqueline Mitchell
title: Mrs Jacqueline Mitchell
text: I got two pair of transition variedfocal for the same price as I paid for the ones I was wareing with the so called free single pair. Had to send them back as they wasn't right but no hassle got them back an they're fine now I'll be getting my glasses from them from now on.
